scripts.generate-assets: npm run generate-json && npm run generate-flutter && npm run generate-flutter2
scripts.dev: npm run process-iconfont && npm run generate-assets && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run process-iconfont && npm run generate-assets && npm run build-web
scripts.deploy: npm run build && rsync -av dist/ user@host:/path/to/hosting

scripts-info.clean: Removes the 'dist' folder to ensure a clean build.
scripts-info.process-iconfont: Processes the icon font files and generates base assets.
scripts-info.generate-assets: Runs all asset generation scripts for mobile (JSON, Flutter, Flutter2).
scripts-info.generate-json: Generates the JSON file for icon metadata.
scripts-info.generate-flutter2: Generates an additional set of Flutter icon files.
scripts-info.build-web: Compiles the web showcase using Webpack.
scripts-info.start: Starts the development server with live reload.
scripts-info.dev: Runs the icon processing, asset generation, and starts the dev server.
scripts-info.build: Performs a full clean build (icons, assets, and web).
scripts-info.deploy: Builds the project and deploys it to the hosting server (adjust path/user).
scripts-info.prepare: Automatically triggers before publishing the package (npm).
